mc.name: Bone Flute
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Book of Rass
mc.oracleText: {2}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

mc.name: Coal Golem
mc.oracleText: {3}, Sacrifice Coal Golem: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Dark Sphere
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Dark Sphere: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, it deals half that damage, rounded up, to you instead.

mc.name: Living Armor
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Living Armor: Put X +0/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

mc.name: Necropolis
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Remove a creature card in your graveyard from the game: Put X +0/+1 counters on Necropolis, where X is the removed card's converted mana cost.

mc.name: Reflecting Mirror
mc.oracleText: {X}, {T}: Change the target of target spell with a single target if that target is you. The new target must be a player. X is twice the converted mana cost of that spell.

mc.name: Scarecrow
mc.oracleText: {6}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by creatures with flying.

mc.name: Standing Stones
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

mc.name: Stone Calendar
mc.oracleText: Spells you play cost up to {1} less to play.

mc.name: Tormod's Crypt
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Remove target player's graveyard from the game.

mc.name: Tower of Coireall
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature can't be blocked by Walls this turn.

mc.name: Wand of Ith
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Target player reveals a card at random from his or her hand. If it's a land card, that player discards it unless he or she pays 1 life. If it isn't a land card, the player discards it unless he or she pays life equal to its converted mana cost. Play this ability only during your turn.

mc.name: War Barge
mc.oracleText: {3}: Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. When War Barge leaves play this turn, destroy that creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Banshee
mc.oracleText: {X}, {T}: Banshee deals X damage divided evenly between you and target creature or player. Round up for you and down for that creature or player.

mc.name: Curse Artifact
mc.oracleText:
Enchant artifact
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Curse Artifact deals 2 damage to that player unless he or she sacrifices that artifact.

mc.name: Eater of the Dead
mc.oracleText: {0}: If Eater of the Dead is tapped, untap it and remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game.

mc.name: Frankenstein's Monster
mc.oracleText: As Frankenstein's Monster comes into play, remove X creature cards in your graveyard from the game. If you can't, put Frankenstein's Monster into its owner's graveyard instead of into play. For each creature card removed this way, Frankenstein's Monster comes into play with a +2/+0, +1/+1, or +0/+2 counter.

mc.name: Grave Robbers
mc.oracleText: {B}, {T}: Remove target artifact card in a graveyard from the game. You gain 2 life.

mc.name: Inquisition
mc.oracleText: Target player reveals his or her hand. Inquisition deals damage to that player equal to the number of white cards in his or her hand.

mc.name: Nameless Race
mc.oracleText:
Trample
As Nameless Race comes into play, pay any amount of life. The amount you pay can't be more than the total number of white nontoken permanents all opponents control plus the total number of white cards in their graveyards.
Nameless Race's power and toughness are each equal to the life paid as it came into play.

mc.name: Season of the Witch
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Season of the Witch unless you pay 2 life.

At end of turn, destroy all untapped creatures that didn't attack this turn, except for creatures that couldn't attack.

mc.name: Worms of the Earth
mc.oracleText:
Players can't play lands.
If a land would come into play, instead it doesn't.
At the beginning of each upkeep, any player may sacrifice two lands or pay 5 life. If a player does either, sacrifice Worms of the Earth.

mc.name: Amnesia
mc.oracleText: Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards.

mc.name: Deep Water
mc.oracleText: {U}: Until end of turn, if you tap a land you control for mana, it produces {U} instead of any other type.

mc.name: Drowned
mc.oracleText: {B}: Regenerate Drowned.

mc.name: Electric Eel
mc.oracleText:
When Electric Eel comes into play, it deals 1 damage to you.
{R}{R}: Electric Eel gets +2/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Giant Shark
mc.oracleText:
Giant Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Whenever Giant Shark blocks or becomes blocked by a creature that has been dealt damage this turn, Giant Shark gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Giant Shark.

mc.name: Mana Vortex
mc.oracleText:
When you play Mana Vortex, you may sacrifice a land. If you don't, counter Mana Vortex.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a land.
When there are no lands in play, sacrifice Mana Vortex.

mc.name: Merfolk Assassin
mc.oracleText: {T}: Destroy target creature with islandwalk.

mc.name: Psychic Allergy
mc.oracleText:
As Psychic Allergy comes into play, choose a color.

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Psychic Allergy deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards of the chosen color he or she controls.

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Psychic Allergy unless you sacrifice two Islands.

mc.name: Riptide
mc.oracleText: Tap all blue creatures.

mc.name: Tangle Kelp
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Tangle Kelp comes into play, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step if it attacked during its controller's last turn.

mc.name: Water Wurm
mc.oracleText: Water Wurm gets +0/+1 as long as an opponent controls an Island.

mc.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Gaea's Touch
mc.oracleText:
You may play an additional land during your turn if that land is a basic Forest.

Sacrifice Gaea's Touch: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.

mc.name: Hidden Path
mc.oracleText: Green creatures have forestwalk.

mc.name: Lurker
mc.oracleText: Lurker can't be the target of spells unless it attacked or blocked this turn.

mc.name: Niall Silvain
mc.oracleText: {G}{G}{G}{G}, {T}: Regenerate target creature.

mc.name: People of the Woods
mc.oracleText: People of the Woods's toughness is equal to the number of Forests you control.

mc.name: Savaen Elves
mc.oracleText: {G}{G}, {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a land.

mc.name: Scarwood Bandits
mc.oracleText:
Forestwalk
{2}{G}, {T}: Unless target artifact's controller pays {2}, gain control of that artifact as long as Scarwood Bandits is in play.

mc.name: Scarwood Hag
mc.oracleText:
{G}{G}{G}{G}, {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
{T}: Target creature loses forestwalk until end of turn.

mc.name: Spitting Slug
mc.oracleText: Whenever Spitting Slug blocks or becomes blocked, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn. Otherwise, each creature blocking or blocked by Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn.

mc.name: Tracker
mc.oracleText: {G}{G}, {T}: Tracker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Tracker.

mc.name: Whippoorwill
mc.oracleText: {G}{G}, {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn. Damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn can't be prevented or dealt instead to another creature or player. When the creature is put into a graveyard this turn, remove the creature from the game.

mc.name: Wormwood Treefolk
mc.oracleText:
{G}{G}: Wormwood Treefolk gains forestwalk until end of turn and deals 2 damage to you.
{B}{B}: Wormwood Treefolk gains swampwalk until end of turn and deals 2 damage to you.

mc.name: Eternal Flame
mc.oracleText: Eternal Flame deals X damage to target opponent, where X is the number of Mountains you control. It deals half X damage, rounded up, to you.

mc.name: Goblin Caves
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
If enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +0/+2.

mc.name: Goblin Shrine
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
If enchanted land is a Mountain, Goblin creatures get +1/+0.
When Goblin Shrine leaves play, it deals 1 damage to each Goblin creature.

mc.name: Goblin Wizard
mc.oracleText:
{T}: You may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand into play.
{R}: Target Goblin gains protection from white until end of turn.

mc.name: Goblins of the Flarg
mc.oracleText:
Mountainwalk
When you control a Dwarf, sacrifice Goblins of the Flarg.

mc.name: Orc General
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice another Orc or Goblin: Other Orc creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Blood of the Martyr
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to any creature, you may have that damage dealt to you instead.

mc.name: Cleansing
mc.oracleText: For each land, destroy that land unless any player pays 1 life.

mc.name: Exorcist
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}, {T}: Destroy target black creature.

mc.name: Fasting
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a hunger counter on Fasting. If Fasting has five or more hunger counters on it, sacrifice it. Otherwise, you may choose to skip your draw step this turn and gain 2 life.

When you draw a card, sacrifice Fasting.

mc.name: Festival
mc.oracleText:
Play Festival only during an opponent's upkeep.
Creatures can't attack this turn.

mc.name: Fire and Brimstone
mc.oracleText: Fire and Brimstone deals 4 damage to target player who declared an attacking creature this turn and 4 damage to you.

mc.name: Holy Light
mc.oracleText: Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Knights of Thorn
mc.oracleText: Banding, protection from red

mc.name: Martyr's Cry
mc.oracleText: Remove all white creatures from the game. For each white creature removed this way, its controller draws a card.

mc.name: Miracle Worker
mc.oracleText: {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a creature you control.

mc.name: Preacher
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Preacher during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature of an opponent's choice that he or she controls as long as Preacher remains tapped.

mc.name: Tivadar's Crusade
mc.oracleText: Destroy all Goblins.

mc.name: Marsh Goblins
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk

mc.name: City of Shadows
mc.oracleText:
{T}, Remove a creature you control from the game: Put a storage counter on City of Shadows.

{T}: Add {X} to your mana pool, where X is the number of storage counters on City of Shadows.

mc.name: Maze of Ith
mc.oracleText: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

mc.name: Safe Haven
mc.oracleText:
{2}, {T}: Remove target creature you control from the game.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card removed from the game with Safe Haven to play under its owner's control.

mc.name: Sorrow's Path
mc.oracleText: {T}: Choose two target blocking creatures an opponent controls. If each of those creatures could block all creatures that the other is blocking, remove both of them from combat. Each one then blocks all creatures the other was blocking. Sorrow's Path deals 2 damage to you and 2 damage to each creature you control.
